snippet.title: VergeWorld - Exclusive Official Reveal Trailer | Summer of Gaming 2022
snippet.description:
Revealed during the IGN Expo, VergeWorld mixes procedural levels and airship customization with the retro PSX-era 3D visuals and synthwave music. See it in action in this new VergeWorld gameplay trailer. Fly, crash, and adapt in this post-apocalyptic high-speed combat racing roguelite. Coming to Steam and other PC storefronts this fall.

#IGN #IGNSummerofGaming
